archiefmat.titel: Nummerlijsten van vrijbrieven aan slaven over 1847-1861
archiefmat.titel_eng: Number lists of manumission letters of slaves during the years 1847-1861
archiefmat.scope:
The manumissions a numbered by year. The names of the masters, the names of the manumitted slaves, and any remarks usually regarding the date the manumission was issued, are registered.

(zie foto's)
archiefmat.notes: The numbers of the manumission letters relate to the actual letters of no. 30 and, as such, form an access to no. 30. The periods do not completely overlap.
